name:
YO-KAI WATCH ™ 3
Update Ver. 1.3
description: This is an update for the game card version of the YO-KAI WATCH ™ 3 game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full game card version of YO-KAI WATCH ™ 3.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
